remarks: The composition of continuous functions is continuous.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnmptid.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
cnmpt11.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
cnmpt1t.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( J Cn L ) ) $.
cnmpt12.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
cnmpt12.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( TopOn ` Z ) ) $.
cnmpt12.c $e |- ( ph -> ( y e. Y , z e. Z |-> C ) e. ( ( K tX L ) Cn M ) ) $.
cnmpt12.d $e |- ( ( y = A /\ z = B ) -> C = D ) $.
cnmpt12 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> D ) e. ( J Cn M ) ) $.

$d B y z $.
